page.title: 13Great Coxwell Youth
page.content: The younger generation have adopted an outrageous way of dressing,desperately trying to state their individuality. This has caused concern among the middle-aged and older generations.In the way they dress youngsters are tending to imitate famous people who are their heroes,e.g.music stars like "Boy George". Facial beauty is not considered as important nowadays as it used to be, as there is a wide range of products available to enhance other attractive parts of the body.People are also realising it is better to be slim and healthy and are now taking care about what they eat; for this reason some are vegetarians. In and around the area there are one or two "transvestites" and a growing "gay" community and this could be described as the latest trend.
